scripts.start: export HASH=$(/bin/bash hash.sh) && cross-env API_BASE=http://localhost:56733/api/v1 parcel index.html
scripts.start:dev: export HASH=$(/bin/bash hash.sh) && cross-env API_BASE=https://prague.williamdunkerley.com/api/v1 parcel index.html
scripts.build:dev: export HASH=$(/bin/bash hash.sh) && cross-env API_BASE=https://prague.williamdunkerley.com/api/v1 parcel build index.html --no-minify --public-url ./
scripts.build:qa: export HASH=$(/bin/bash hash.sh) && cross-env API_BASE=https://santiago.williamdunkerley.com/api/v1 parcel build index.html --no-minify --public-url ./
scripts.build:prod: export HASH=$(/bin/bash hash.sh) && cross-env API_BASE=https://amsterdam.williamdunkerley.com/api/v1 parcel build index.html --no-minify --public-url ./
